name: part_010
file: tmp_【#つながるホロライブDAY2】hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish【チラ見せ】 [LgyXzn0k0MA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Venue announcements in Japanese for hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish Day 2 by Sakamata Chloe and Kazama Iroha.
Venue announcements in English by members of hololive English -Council-.
Segment with distorted, high-speed audio and visual transitions.
Venue announcements in Indonesian by Pavolia Reine and Kureiji Ollie.

subtitles.original: ホロライブ６期生の沙花叉クロヱです！
subtitles.english: I'm Sakamata Chloe of hololive 6th Gen!

subtitles.original: 本日は「hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish Supported By ヴァイスシュヴァルツ Day 2」にご来場いただき、ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming to "hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish Supported By Weiss Schwarz Day 2" today!

subtitles.original: 同じくホロライブ６期生の風真いろはでござる。
subtitles.english: I am Kazama Iroha, also of hololive 6th Gen.

subtitles.original: 今日は私たちが場内アナウンスを担当いたします。今日一日、よろしくお願いいたします。
subtitles.english: We will be in charge of the venue announcements today. We look forward to spending the day with you.

subtitles.original: 開演の前にお客様にご案内がございます。まずは、会場のみなさまへのご案内です。
subtitles.english: Before the show starts, we have some information for our guests. First, for those in the venue.

subtitles.original: ロビー、客席内では、マスク着用が必須となります。
subtitles.english: Wearing a mask is mandatory in the lobby and at your seats.

subtitles.original: 公演中の掛け声などは、新型コロナウイルス感染予防の観点からご遠慮ください。
subtitles.english: Please refrain from shouting or cheering during the performance to prevent the spread of COVID-19.

subtitles.original: ぜひ、拍手やペンライトなどでの応援をお願いします。
subtitles.english: Please support us with clapping and penlights.

subtitles.original: また、会場内では立って応援いただいても問題ございませんが、周りのお客様にご迷惑にならないようご配慮お願いいたします。
subtitles.english: Also, while you may stand during the show, please be considerate of those around you.

subtitles.original: 続いて、配信をご覧のみなさまへのご案内です。
subtitles.english: Next, some information for those watching the stream.

subtitles.original: 本ライブの録音、録画、ミラー配信や違法アップロードは固くお断りいたします。
subtitles.english: Recording, filming, mirror streaming, and illegal uploads of this live performance are strictly prohibited.

subtitles.original: その代わり、スクリーンショットでの撮影をしていただくことや、SNSで感想を呟いていただくことは大歓迎なので...
subtitles.english: Instead, taking screenshots and sharing your thoughts on social media is very welcome...

subtitles.original: みなさん、ハッシュタグ「#つながるホロライブDAY2」で感想を呟いて、SNSもいっぱい盛り上げてください！
subtitles.english: ...so please use the hashtag #hololiveLinkYourWishDay2 and help liven up social media!

subtitles.original: 本ライブ配信はデータ通信量が多くなることが想定されるため、スマートフォンでご覧になる場合は、Wi-Fi環境でのご利用を推奨いたします。
subtitles.english: As this live stream is expected to consume a lot of data, we recommend using a Wi-Fi environment if you are watching on a smartphone.

subtitles.original: インターネット回線の接続が不安定な場合は、配信動画のクオリティを保証できませんので、ご了承ください。
subtitles.english: Please understand that we cannot guarantee the quality of the stream if your internet connection is unstable.

subtitles.original: また、最善の準備を行いライブ配信を実施いたしますが、生配信である特性上、不慮の障害で一時停止や映像の乱れなどが起こる可能性があることを、あらかじめご了承ください。
subtitles.english: Also, while we are doing our best to prepare for the stream, please understand that due to the nature of live broadcasting, unexpected issues may cause pauses or video distortions.

subtitles.original: それでは、開演までもうしばらくお待ちください。
subtitles.english: Well then, please wait a little longer until the show starts.

subtitles.original: Hello everyone! I am Kronii from hololive English -Council-.
subtitles.english: Hello everyone! I am Kronii from hololive English -Council-.

subtitles.original: I am Baelz from hololive English -Council-. Thank you everyone for coming to hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish Supported By Weiss Schwarz Day 2!
subtitles.english: I am Baelz from hololive English -Council-. Thank you everyone for coming to hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish Supported By Weiss Schwarz Day 2!

subtitles.original: And I'm Fauna, also from hololive English -Council-. Today we will be in charge of all the announcements within the venue. We hope you have an amazing time!
subtitles.english: And I'm Fauna, also from hololive English -Council-. Today we will be in charge of all the announcements within the venue. We hope you have an amazing time!

subtitles.original: Before the show starts, we have some quick announcements. We would like to first address the audience here today.
subtitles.english: Before the show starts, we have some quick announcements. We would like to first address the audience here today.

subtitles.original: Masks are mandatory and must be worn in the lobby and auditorium. Please refrain from shouting during the performances in order to prevent the spread of coronavirus.
subtitles.english: Masks are mandatory and must be worn in the lobby and auditorium. Please refrain from shouting during the performances in order to prevent the spread of coronavirus.

subtitles.original: We would love it if you support us with handclapping and penlights.
subtitles.english: We would love it if you support us with handclapping and penlights.

subtitles.original: In addition, it is fine to stand up and cheer within the venue. However, please be considerate of those around you when doing so.
subtitles.english: In addition, it is fine to stand up and cheer within the venue. However, please be considerate of those around you when doing so.

subtitles.original: Next is a short reminder to all of you who will be watching the livestream. It is strictly prohibited to record, tape, mirror, or illegally upload this live performance.
subtitles.english: Next is a short reminder to all of you who will be watching the livestream. It is strictly prohibited to record, tape, mirror, or illegally upload this live performance.

subtitles.original: However, you are definitely welcome to take pictures and share your experiences on all social media platforms. If you decide to do so, please use the hashtag #hololiveLinkYourWishDay2 and feel free to share your thoughts on social media.
subtitles.english: However, you are definitely welcome to take pictures and share your experiences on all social media platforms. If you decide to do so, please use the hashtag #hololiveLinkYourWishDay2 and feel free to share your thoughts on social media.

subtitles.original: This live performance is expected to require a large amount of data transmission and bandwidth. We heavily recommend that you use Wi-Fi when viewing this event on your smartphone.
subtitles.english: This live performance is expected to require a large amount of data transmission and bandwidth. We heavily recommend that you use Wi-Fi when viewing this event on your smartphone.

subtitles.original: If your internet connection is unstable, we cannot guarantee the quality of the delivered video. Although we will do our best to prepare for the live broadcast, please keep in mind that due to the nature of live broadcasts, there is a possibility of pauses or distortions in the video due to unforeseen problems.
subtitles.english: If your internet connection is unstable, we cannot guarantee the quality of the delivered video. Although we will do our best to prepare for the live broadcast, please keep in mind that due to the nature of live broadcasts, there is a possibility of pauses or distortions in the video due to unforeseen problems.

subtitles.original: Nama saya Reine dari hololive Indonesia Generasi 2.
subtitles.english: My name is Reine from hololive Indonesia Generation 2.

subtitles.original: Terima kasih telah datang ke hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish Supported By Weiss Schwarz Day 2 pada hari ini.
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming to hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish Supported By Weiss Schwarz Day 2 today.

subtitles.original: Dan aku Ollie dari hololive Indonesia Generasi 2.
subtitles.english: And I'm Ollie from hololive Indonesia Generation 2.

subtitles.original: Hari ini kami akan bertanggung jawab untuk membacakan pengumuman.
subtitles.english: Today we will be responsible for reading the announcements.

subtitles.original: Semoga hari ini akan menjadi hari yang menyenangkan.
subtitles.english: We hope today will be a fun day.

subtitles.original: Pertama-tama, ada beberapa pengumuman untuk para tamu.
subtitles.english: First of all, there are some announcements for our guests.
